name: ChallengeonFriends
0:
”Alexa, open challenge on friends”
”Alexa, start challenge on friends”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: challenge on friends
des: Are you a big fan of friends tv show? Play an interesting game of quiz about friends with Alexa. While playing the quiz, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next question. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the quiz.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
